name: Super Pet Frenzy
description:
Enjoy the accompany with pets and connect colorful pets to solve compelling levels in this puzzle adventure!

FEATURES:
- Over 100 exciting match 3 levels and update more soon.
- Awesome visual effects.
- Challenging and fun-filled match-three mechanics.
- Powerful pet frenzy boosters to help with challenging levels.
- Easy to start and play, challenging to master.
